Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine purplish brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Production date: 139 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes, 2015, 143.)
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '369' Name Lapheides. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0167.28.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (174)
